methods.name: public MagnificationConfig.Builder setMode(@MagnificationMode int mode)
methods.comment:
* Sets the magnification mode.
         *
         * @param mode The magnification mode
         * @return This builder

methods.name: public MagnificationConfig.Builder setActivated(boolean activated)
methods.comment:
* Sets magnification activated state.
         *
         * @param activated The magnification activated state
         * @return This builder

methods.name: public MagnificationConfig.Builder setScale(@FloatRange(from = 1f, to = 8f) float scale)
methods.comment:
* Sets the magnification scale.
         *
         * @param scale The magnification scale, in the range [1, 8]
         * @return This builder

methods.name: public MagnificationConfig.Builder setCenterX(float centerX)
methods.comment:
* Sets the X coordinate of the center of the magnification viewport.
         * The controlling magnifier will apply the given position.
         *
         * @param centerX the screen-relative X coordinate around which to
         *                center and scale that is in the range [0, screenWidth],
         *                or {@link Float#NaN} to leave unchanged
         * @return This builder

methods.name: public MagnificationConfig.Builder setCenterY(float centerY)
methods.comment:
* Sets the Y coordinate of the center of the magnification viewport.
         * The controlling magnifier will apply the given position.
         *
         * @param centerY the screen-relative Y coordinate around which to
         *                center and scale that is in the range [0, screenHeight],
         *                or {@link Float#NaN} to leave unchanged
         * @return This builder

methodNames: public MagnificationConfig.Builder setScale(@FloatRange(from = 1f, to = 8f) float scale)
